Introduction

Justin Youn also known as Dongyeon is a Filipino-South Korean singer and dancer under GRID Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group POW. He was a contestant in the SBS survival program "Loud" under JYP Entertainment but was eliminated in the 7th round.
